column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The food was good
column2: my two-stars review is solely on service
column3: took my sister for her birthday
column4: and requested the waitress to bring her the tofu pudding with a candle on it at the end so we can sing for her. She said they don't have candles
column6: we can still sing. Then she brought out the pudding and just set it on the table while we were still eating!!! I specifically told her after we were done
column8: we were all confused so we just started singing while we still had food in our mouth!!!
